mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHARGING_STATION ( INSTALL_YEAR, SIDO, GUNGU, ADDRESS, STATION_NAME, FACILITY_TYPE_LARGE, FACILITY_TYPE_SMALL, MODEL_LARGE, MODEL_SMALL, OPERATOR_LARGE, OPERATOR_SMALL, RAPID_CHARGE_AMOUNT, CHARGER_TYPE, USER_RESTRICTION ) VALUES ( #{installYear}, #{sido}, #{gungu}, #{address}, #{stationName}, #{facilityTypeLarge}, #{facilityTypeSmall}, #{modelLarge}, #{modelSmall}, #{operatorLarge}, #{operatorSmall}, #{rapidChargeAmount}, #{chargerType}, #{userRestriction} )
